chat.welcomeSubtitle: How can I help you trade today?
chat.fileUploadFailed: file(s) failed to upload. You can retry them.
chat.noInternet: No internet connection. Your messages won't send until you're back online.

hero.subtitle: Pelican replaces scanners, spreadsheets, and half-answers with real market intelligence.

what.title: CURSOR IS FOR DEVELOPERS. PELICAN IS FOR TRADERS.
what.description1: Leave the tabs behind. Pelican brings charts, data, and AI together so you can ask market questions in plain English.
what.description2: Turn ideas into clear, data-backed answers - fast, focused, and built for trading decisions.
what.platformCommand: backtest momentum strategy on SPY, last 6 months
what.platformGenerating: Here’s a concise backtest summary with key trades, performance, and takeaways...

features.title: TRADING INTELLIGENCE, NOT ANOTHER TOOL TO LEARN
features.justAskDesc: Type questions like you'd ask a trading buddy. "What's moving in semis today?" "Show me SPY's worst drawdowns." No syntax, no learning curve.
features.testIdeasDesc: Describe any strategy in plain English and see if it actually works. Win rates, drawdowns, Sharpe ratios—without writing a single line of code.
features.knowsStyleDesc: Pelican remembers your positions, your watchlist, and how you like to trade. Every conversation picks up where you left off.
features.findsWhatDesc: Ask the market exactly what you want to see. "Show me stocks trading above $200 that gapped up today." No filters, no dashboards. Just answers.
features.shareProDesc: Generate branded tables and analysis ready for Twitter, Discord, or clients. One click from insight to shareable content.
features.killChaosDesc: Stop bouncing between TradingView, spreadsheets, and ChatGPT. One interface for research, analysis, and idea generation.

traders.title: PELICAN FOR EVERY TRADER
traders.subtitle: Whether you’re just starting or running size, Pelican speaks your language.
traders.newTraderQuestion: Is this dip worth buying or should I wait?
traders.experiencedTraderQuestion: Using historical data, how does QQQ usually perform in the two weeks after a −3% day?

languages.title: AVAILABLE IN 30+ LANGUAGES
languages.subtitle: Pelican speaks your language, wherever you trade - available in 30+ languages

team.title: BUILT BY TRADERS, FOR TRADERS
team.nickBio: Nick Groves is a systems-driven trader with eight years of experience across futures, FX, equities, and digital assets. He co-hosts daily market calls and founded Pelican after years of watching traders overpay for shallow tools — with a mission to make institutional-grade insight accessible and honest.
team.rayBio: Ray Campbell helped build the NYSE's transition to electronic trading at LaBranche & Co., designing ultra-low-latency systems across hundreds of stocks. He has since architected exchange-grade platforms across equities, futures, options, and crypto — spanning matching engines, market data pipelines, and high-performance systems.

pricing.title: CREDIT-BASED PRICING THAT SCALES WITH YOU
pricing.sameFeaturesDesc: Access to the same tools in every plan. All tiers include everything Pelican has to offer. The only difference is how many credits you get each month. Compatible with US stocks, Foreign Exchange (FX), and Cryptocurrencies.
pricing.creditsExplainer: Credits are like points you spend when you ask for help. Easy questions use a few points. Bigger questions use more. You can always see how many points you have left.
pricing.basicAnalysisExample: "Is NVDA overbought?" / "Show me AAPL's moving averages"
pricing.eventStudyExample: "How does SPY react after CPI?" / "Compare AAPL vs MSFT"
pricing.deepAnalysisExample: "Backtest this strategy 1 year" / "Show institutional flow on SPY"
pricing.marketComparisonDesc: Pelican delivers the analysis power of institutional terminals at a fraction of the cost.

cta.subtitle: Join traders who've upgraded from scattered tools to unified intelligence.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Pelican Trading. Can't find what you're looking for? Use the chat widget or contact our support team.
faq.teamHere: Our team is here to help. Reach out anytime.
